price: 26. Qarnwaay, baaxól ginók cnnittam inkih Yalli-le, ginó inkih tikki ittaamak kaah taqunxeeh, kay amri oggolta.
arabic: وَلَهُۥ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ كُلّٞ لَّهُۥ قَٰنِتُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: walahu man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi kullun lahu qānitūna
